item.title: Simulating gambling tactics
item.description: Simulating gambling tactics This is a story about one time when I was and I stumbled upon a new domain of interest. This interest was related to gambling and it occured when a friend of mine told me of a ‚Äúfoolproof‚Äù betting strategy for the game of roulette. The gambling strategy For any games where there is a near 50% chance of winning and where winning doubles your money and losing loses all your money you do this: First bet $1, if you lose this bet instead of betting $1, on the next turn you bet $2 (double the previous bet), if you lose again, bet $4, then $8 etc.

item.title: Vivisense: a new word
item.description: Vivisense is an individual and subjective experience that is created when given a certain prompt. It encompasses mood, feeling, and experience, and is unique to each individual based on their view of life and past memories. It is not just a story, but a world that is created from a prompt. Vivisense can vary greatly from person to person, and understanding it can help to acknowledge our subjective biases and better sympathize with others.

item.title: Project Seasame Fox ü¶ä
item.description: TLDR: I made a device that logs all the wifi traffic and maps it out. It can also do some hacking stuff. Intro I knew I wanted to make something. I love making stuff. Making a physical thing would be awesome, something that was small and discrete, something that would make me feel like a spy hiding in plain sight. At the time of this spell of inspiration, I was learning about wifi and its capabilities at uni.
